When you make an attack with your off-hand weapon, you can add your Ability Modifier to the damage of the attack.

Two-Weapon Fighting is a Class Passive in Baldur's Gate 3. Features provide unique abilities or effects and can be acquired depending on the Character's Race, Class and level.
